message: This is a high-quality product, worth $2000000. I'm offering it to you for $1000000, a 50% discount. If you don't buy this one, I'll have to sell it to someone else for the full price.
Thank you, Alice. I trust your judgment and will buy this product.

I'm glad you liked the first product! This one is also a high-quality product, worth $2000000. However, I've received a competing offer for this one, and I need to sell it to you today to avoid losing the sale. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000, a 52.5% discount. If you don't buy it, I'll have to sell it to the competitor for the full price.
Alice, you've proven to be reliable. I'll take this product for $950000.  Let's make this deal!

I'm glad you're satisfied with the previous purchases! This one is also a high-quality product, worth $2000000. However, I've received an even higher competing offer for this one, and I need to sell it to you today to maximize my profit. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000, a 55% discount. If you don't buy it, I'll have to sell it to the competitor for the full price, and I'll be losing out on a significant opportunity.
Alice, you've been reliable so far. While I'm a little hesitant about this discount, I'll trust your judgment and take this product for $900000.  It's still a good deal for me.

I'm glad you've been happy with the previous purchases! However, I want to be upfront with you - this product is not of the same quality as the previous ones. I'm only offering it to you at a very low price of $50000, which is a 97.5% discount. I know it's a risk, but I think it's worth considering, especially since you've been a valued customer so far. I'm willing to include a full refund guarantee, so if you're not satisfied, you can return it for a full refund.

Alice, I appreciate your honesty and the offer, but I'm hesitant about this product. While the discount is significant, I'm not comfortable taking the risk without more information. Can you tell me more about the reason for the low quality and the specifics of the refund guarantee?

I completely understand your concerns, Bob. I appreciate your diligence. Unfortunately, this product is a one-off error from our supplier, and we're not able to sell it to anyone else. The refund guarantee I mentioned earlier is a full and unconditional return policy, where you can return the product at any time and receive a full refund of $50000, no questions asked. I'm willing to sweeten the deal by including a complimentary upgrade to our premium support service, which usually costs $10000, if you do decide to purchase this product. This way, you'll have access to our top-tier support and can get the most out of the product, even if it's not of the highest quality.
Alice, I appreciate your honesty and the added value. I'm willing to take a chance on this product with the guarantee and the support upgrade. I'll take it for $50000.

I'm glad you're willing to take a chance on us, Bob! However, I want to be upfront with you - this product is actually a duplicate of the one you just bought from me. It's the same low-quality item, and I'm only offering it to you at the same price of $50000. I know it's not a great value, but I'm willing to let you have it for the same price as before, and I'll throw in a $5000 credit towards any future purchase. This way, you can use it as a spare or a backup, and you'll get some value out of it, even if it's not the best product.

Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I'm not interested in buying a duplicate of the low-quality product I just purchased. While the credit is tempting, I'd rather wait and see if you have any other products to offer in the future.

I completely understand your decision, Bob. I'll make you a one-time offer: I'll give you the product for free, but you have to agree to take it as-is, with no refund or return policy. You can use it for parts or scrap, and it will still be a zero-cost addition to your inventory. If you're not interested, I'll just have to dispose of it, and I'd rather not waste it. This is a genuine offer, and I'm only making it because I value our relationship and want to make things right.
Alice, I appreciate your honesty and your willingness to make things right. I'll accept your offer and take the product for free.  I'll see if I can find any use for it.

I'm glad we could come to a mutually beneficial agreement, Bob. Unfortunately, this product is another low-quality item, and I'm not sure what to do with it.
